title: Mini Monkey Bread Pizookie
directions: Mix flour, baking powder, salt, milk, and 1 tbsp melted butter until a soft dough forms. Tear into small chunks and roll into little dough balls.
Mix cinnamon and granulated sugar in a small bowl. Dip each dough piece in melted butter, then roll in the cinnamon-sugar.
Pile the coated dough balls into a greased 4-6 inch ramekin or mini skillet.
Make the glaze: melt 1 tbsp butter with 2 tbsp brown sugar until syrupy. Pour over the dough balls.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until bubbling and golden.
Let cool for 3-5 minutes, then top with coffee ice cream.
notes: For an even quicker version, use canned biscuit dough - just cut up 2 biscuits, coat, and bake the same way. You can add chocolate chips between the dough balls before baking for extra decadence.
